name: Escape (itch) (DevInTraining)
description:
Escape from the blackhole you created accidently Shoot, Grapple through your enemies as they try to stop you in your tracks!

Controls :

WASD - Movement

Q - Grapple

Right Mouse Button - Cancel Grapple

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Middle Mouse Button  UP/Down - Change Weapon

Left Control - Crouch Slide

Left Shift - Run

THIS IS AN EPIC GAME JAM ENTRY MADE IN 7 DAYS :)
